intro.description: This tutorial guides you through the open/close mechanism of the review(s).

item.title: Create Review
item.description: Create a new review, with pressing the NewReview-icon.

item.title: Insert Data
item.description: Insert the data belonging to this review. The review name must nut be empty and also an unique identifier. The other data is optional and can also be changes or inserted later.

item.title: Finish
item.description: Press Finish to insert this review and close the wizard.
